sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form,ListGrou} from 'reactstrap' import {useParam} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParam() //this is an static data later we will call our API and load data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not Rated") : ( ({reviews.length}))}
} export default TourDetails
